code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faAngleUp}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'./ButtonTop.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ButtonTop=function ButtonTop(){useEffect(function(){var btnTopValue=document.getElementById('btnTop');window.addEventListener('scroll',function(){var scrollVallue=window.scrollY;if(scrollVallue<120){btnTopValue.style.display='none';}else{btnTopValue.style.display='block';}});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-button-top",id:"btnTop",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faAngleUp,className:"up-icon text-white"})})});};export default ButtonTop;
